Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.cli.view

Class PlayerStateView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.cli.view.TerminalView
it.polimi.ingsw.client.cli.view.PlayerStateView
public class PlayerStateView extends TerminalView
This Class represents the PlayerStateView that shows a textual representation of the Player's School Board and assistant cards

    • extractAndPrintStudent

      private void extractAndPrintStudent(StringBuilder stringBuilder, StudentHost entrance, @Nullable @Nullable Student lockedStudent)
      Prints a Student using an ASCII art representation, with color-matched SS characters, or "__" if the space is empty
      Parameters:
      stringBuilder - (type StringBuilder) the builder where the method should write the strings
      entrance - (type StudentHost) the student host object which we need to print the students of
      lockedStudent - (typeStudent) if specified, we only print this student. Otherwise, we print the entire contents of the host
